mapper.select:
select distinct e.emp_num, e.emp_name, e.position_grade, e.emp_phonenum, e.emp_email, d.dept_name, e.emp_desk_num, e.emp_address
from employee e join department d on e.dept_code = d.dept_code where auth_code='normal';

select distinct e.emp_num, e.emp_name, e.position_grade, e.emp_phonenum, e.emp_email, d.dept_name, e.emp_desk_num, e.emp_address
from employee e join department d on e.dept_code = d.dept_code WHERE (e.emp_name >= #{first_consonant} AND e.emp_name < #{second_consonant} ) and auth_code='normal';

select distinct e.emp_num, e.emp_name, e.position_grade, e.emp_phonenum, e.emp_email, d.dept_name, e.emp_desk_num, e.emp_address
from employee e join department d on e.dept_code = d.dept_code WHERE (e.emp_name >= #{first_consonant} AND e.emp_name < #{second_consonant} ) and auth_code='normal';

select distinct e.emp_num, e.emp_name, e.position_grade, e.emp_phonenum, e.emp_email, d.dept_name, e.emp_desk_num, e.emp_address
from employee e join department d on e.dept_code = d.dept_code where e.emp_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') and auth_code='normal';

select distinct e.emp_name, e.position_grade, e.emp_phonenum, e.emp_email, d.dept_name, e.emp_desk_num, e.emp_address
from employee e join department d on e.dept_code = d.dept_code;

select distinct e.emp_num, e.emp_name, e.position_grade, e.emp_phonenum, e.emp_email, d.dept_name, e.emp_desk_num, e.emp_address
from employee e join department d on e.dept_code = d.dept_code where e.emp_num=#{emp_num};
